    • Field Detail

      • PREFIX

        public static val PREFIX : String
        Description copied from class: LoggingConfig
        Prefix for the configuration entries of the logging configuration.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PLATFORM_MESSAGE_FORMAT_NAME

        public static val PLATFORM_MESSAGE_FORMAT_NAME : String
        Description copied from class: LoggingConfig
        Name of property that contains the format of the logging messages on the platform.

        The format string may contains one of the following elements:

        • %1: the date,
        • %2: the name of the calling function,
        • %3: the name of the logger,
        • %4: the logging level,
        • %5: the message, and
        • %6: the throwable.
        See Also:
        LoggingConfig.PLATFORM_MESSAGE_FORMAT_VALUE, Constant Field Values

      • PLATFORM_MESSAGE_FORMAT_VALUE

        public static val PLATFORM_MESSAGE_FORMAT_VALUE : String
        Description copied from class: LoggingConfig
        Format of the logging messages on the platform.

        The format string may contains one of the following elements:

        • %1: the date,
        • %2: the name of the calling function,
        • %3: the name of the logger,
        • %4: the logging level,
        • %5: the message, and
        • %6: the throwable.
        See Also:
        LoggingConfig.PLATFORM_MESSAGE_FORMAT_NAME, Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setPlatformMessageFormat

        public def setPlatformMessageFormat(pattern : String) : void 
        Description copied from class: LoggingConfig
        Change the pattern of the platform messages.

        The format string may contains one of the following elements:

        • %1: the date,
        • %2: the name of the calling function,
        • %3: the name of the logger,
        • %4: the logging level,
        • %5: the message, and
        • %6: the throwable.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the new pattern, or null to use the default pattern.

      • getPlatformMessageFormat

        @Pure
public def getPlatformMessageFormat() : String
